java.lang.Object

              +--org.pokersource.enum.HoldemCanonGroup
public class HoldemCanonGroup
extends HoldemHandGroup

A holdem hand group representing sets of starting hands defined using canonical notation: "KK", "AQs", "T9".

Author:
Michael Maurer
